# INTRODUCTION

![](images/clipboard-1373316247.png){width="398"}

![](images/clipboard-2725585515.png)

This thesis project aimed to assess the variation in the use of analgesics in the elderly in long term care facilities (LTCFs), identify the patient/facility related factors associated with the variation in prescription. You can find details of the project [here](https://github.com/borison365/Demographic-health-survey/blob/main/Thesis%20data%20on%20Analgesic%20use.R){target="blank"} ---
